structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

law.catch_line: Verification Of Accounting Statements; Publication Of Reports
law.text: [ Text of section effective until January 1, 2013. For text effective January 1, 2013, see below.] He shall verify all accounting statements included in reports of departments, offices and commissions before the publication of such reports. No such report shall be published by any such department, office or commission until such statements are so verified and approved. Chapter 7A: Reconciliation of accounting statements included reports with official books and records [ Text of section as amended by 2012, 165, Sec. 78 effective January 1, 2013. See 2012, 165, Sec. 137. For text effective until January 1, 2013, see above.] The comptroller shall establish policies and procedures that require all accounting statements included in reports of departments, offices and commissions to reconcile to the official books and records of the commonwealth before the publication of such reports. No such report shall be published by any such department, office or commission until such statements are so confirmed.
